review_details: We all had a relaxing weekends stay at this lovely well furnished property very well equipped and lovely scenery !

Fantastic meal and desert very tasty and well presented!
Will defently visit again if I’m in the area !

What a great days fishing with the friendliest guy you’ll ever meet so much knowledge of the local area and knows where the fish are . He supplied beer, ham and cheese rolls , and a superb fruit salad ! Well done skipper we all had a great day!

This was an immense experience with unbelievable food and views. The stairs were well worth the walk up!

All staff were highly attentive and were very friendly.

Food was exceptional and incredible value for the service and quality that was received.

Highly recommend!

Another fantastic stay David and Mardie are fantastic hosts and can't do enough to make your stay enjoyable !! Thank you guys and look forward to seeing you all next year !! My wife and me have stayed here for the last four years and the prices have never changed and the service and quality is second to none

A excellent stay as always at the crossways David and Mardy are the best hosts on the island and always make are stay enjoyable comfortable and relaxing. The breakfast is fantastic !!!!! The garden always looks good and the accommodation is always very clean .

Fantastic weekend made possible by David and Marde .Beautiful rooms and fantastic food the perfect hosts! Thanks guys.I will tell all are friends and will be staying again next year.Thankyou for making are stay so perfect 5star.
